message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - net.minecraft.server.v1_16_R3.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.creatures.CreatureUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Arrays' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.creatures.CreatureUtils'.
